channel.title: I GET THIS ERROR WITH RUNSERVER.BAT when I try adding highscores!
channel.description:
Ok here is the problem
Normally when a player logs out, it would save to MySQL all the stats.
But instead in runserver.bat.....I get this error
[code]java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.mysql.jdbc.Driver[/code]
ANY HELP??

item.title: I GET THIS ERROR WITH RUNSERVER.BAT when I try adding highscores!
